name: Social Disappearance Strategies
description: Techniques for disappearing from controlled systems and maintaining a low profile while on the run.

cards.title: Building an Alternative Identity
cards.description: How to create and maintain a new identity to evade detection.
bulletpoints: Adopting new behavior patterns to fit into different environments.
Using financial and social tools to reinforce identity credibility.

cards.title: Avoiding Recognition in Digital and Physical Spaces
cards.description: Staying off-grid and preventing identification in monitored environments.
bulletpoints: Using clothing, posture, and movement to avoid biometric scans.
Minimizing digital footprints while maintaining functional connectivity.
Understanding and exploiting gaps in mass surveillance systems.

cards.title: Long-Term Disappearance Strategies
cards.description: How to sustain an undetectable presence over extended periods.
bulletpoints: Adapting to different cultural and social settings unnoticed.
Establishing self-sufficient resource channels for survival.
Developing contingency plans for unexpected exposure.
